message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the security issues in IoT and proposes a blockchain-based solution. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the limitations of the centralized cloud-based IoT service architecture, which falls under the category of cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The proposed framework and system design involve distributed systems and decentralized architectures, which could be categorized under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Finally, the paper discusses the implementation of the proposed system on the Ethereum blockchain, which falls under the category of cs.SE (Software Engineering).
